description: LOS ANGELES -- Mercedes-Benz took a blow to its used-vehicle quality perception by falling below average in the latest J.D. Power Vehicle Dependability Index study. It is the first time the German prestige marque has fallen below industry average since J.D ...
headline: Mercedes falls in perceived quality; products score below average on J.D. Power index

description: J.D. Power released its annual Initial Quality Study today, and it reveals some remarkable shifts in what buyers think of different brands after 90 days of ownership. We always point out that this study needs to be read in context — 90 days isn’t a lot ...
headline: Ford Models Top New J.D. Power Quality List; Mercedes Radically Improves

description: The Mercedes-Benz plants in East London, South Africa, and Bremen, Germany, are building high-quality cars. That’s the result of a recently published study conducted by the U.S. based market research institute J.D. Power and Associates. On July 13 ...
